title: 6 Quick Steps to Download & Install Spotify on macOS

steps.title: Go to https://www.spotify.com/us/download/mac/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.spotify.com/us/download/mac/ in a web browser. You can use any browser. [1] X Research source Spotify is also available on iPhone and iPad in the App Store . Make sure to install any available updates on your Mac.

steps.title: Click Download.
steps.content: Click Download . This is the white button in the center of the screen. [2] X Research source The installer will begin downloading to your device.

steps.title: Unzip the file
steps.content: Unzip the file . Use your browser's Downloads section or the Finder to find the ZIP file. In most cases, this will look like SpotifyInstaller.zip . Double-click the ZIP file to unzip it. [3] X Research source When it's finished, you'll see the Install Spotify application in the same folder.

steps.title: Double-click the "Install Spotify" application.
steps.content: Double-click the "Install Spotify" application. A pop-up warning will open.

steps.title: Click Open.
steps.content: Click Open . This is the blue button. You'll see the progress bar as it downloads. This may take a few minutes.

steps.title: Launch Spotify.
steps.content: Launch Spotify. If Spotify doesn't open automatically after installation, find it in the Launchpad and click it. Enter your email address and password to begin using Spotify . You can download music for offline listening, create playlists, share with friends, and more.
